<figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="/wiki/File:Virat_Kohli_ODI_Graph.png" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/31/Virat_Kohli_ODI_Graph.png/640px-Virat_Kohli_ODI_Graph.png" decoding="async" width="640" height="241" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/31/Virat_Kohli_ODI_Graph.png/960px-Virat_Kohli_ODI_Graph.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/31/Virat_Kohli_ODI_Graph.png/1280px-Virat_Kohli_ODI_Graph.png 2x" data-file-width="1669" data-file-height="628"></a><figcaption>An innings-by-innings breakdown of Kohli's ODI batting career, showing runs scored  (blue and red (not out) bars) and the black line is his career batting average.</figcaption></figure>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading3"><h3 id="T20I_match_performance">T20I match performance</h3></div>
<figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="/wiki/File:Virat_Kohli_T20I_Graph.png" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ab/Virat_Kohli_T20I_Graph.png/640px-Virat_Kohli_T20I_Graph.png" decoding="async" width="640" height="225" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ab/Virat_Kohli_T20I_Graph.png/960px-Virat_Kohli_T20I_Graph.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ab/Virat_Kohli_T20I_Graph.png/1280px-Virat_Kohli_T20I_Graph.png 2x" data-file-width="1552" data-file-height="546"></a><figcaption>An innings-by-innings breakdown of Kohli's T20I batting career, showing runs scored (blue and red (not out) bars) and the black line is his career batting average.</figcaption></figure>
<p>Kohli holds a prominent place in the annals of Indian cricket. He has the distinction of being the only cricketer to have been named the Player of the Tournament in the T20 World Cup on two separate occasions, in <a href="/wiki/2014_ICC_World_Twenty20" title="2014 ICC World Twenty20">2014</a> and <a href="/wiki/2016_ICC_World_Twenty20" title="2016 ICC World Twenty20">2016</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-133" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-133"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>132<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In terms of ODI centuries, he ranks first with 50.<sup id="cite_ref-134" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-134"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>133<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> He surpassed Sachin Tendulkar's tally of 49 ODI tons and achieved this feat on 15 November 2023 in the semifinal of the <a href="/wiki/2023_Cricket_World_Cup" title="2023 Cricket World Cup">2023 Cricket World Cup</a>, while also becoming the first player to score more than 700 runs in a single edition of the tournament.<sup id="cite_ref-135" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-135"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>134<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Furthermore, in international cricket, Kohli has amassed 80 centuries, second only to Sachin Tendulkar's 100 centuries.<sup id="cite_ref-136" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-136"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>135<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In 2018, Kohli set a record, becoming the first player to score 1,000 ODI runs in 11 innings in a calendar year.<sup id="cite_ref-137" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-137"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>136<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In 2022, he achieved another milestone by scoring 1,000 runs in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, becoming the second player to reach this feat after Mahela Jayawardene.<sup id="cite_ref-138" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-138"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>137<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> During the match against Bangladesh, he became the top-scorer in the history of T20 World Cup.<sup id="cite_ref-139" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-139"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>138<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading4"><h4 id="Test_records">Test records</h4></div>
<ul><li>Most wins as captain of India, with 40 wins out of 68 matches<sup id="cite_ref-140" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-140"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>139<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>Four Test double-hundreds in four consecutive series<sup id="cite_ref-141" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-141"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>140<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading4"><h4 id="ODI_records">ODI records</h4></div>
<ul><li>Most ODI centuries (50)</li>
<li>Most ODI centuries while chasing (27)<sup id="cite_ref-142" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-142"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>141<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>Most ODI centuries in India (22)<sup id="cite_ref-143" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-143"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>142<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b>Fastest to -</b><sup id="cite_ref-144" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-144"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>b<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 8,000 runs (175 innings),<sup id="cite_ref-145" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-145"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>143<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 9,000 runs (194 innings),<sup id="cite_ref-146" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-146"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>144<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 10,000 runs (205 innings),<sup id="cite_ref-147" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-147"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>145<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 11,000 runs (222 innings),<sup id="cite_ref-148" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-148"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>146<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 12,000 runs (242 innings),<sup id="cite_ref-149" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-149"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>147<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and 13,000 runs (267 innings)</li></ul>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading4"><h4 id="T20I_records">T20I records</h4></div>
<ul><li>Highest career batting average in T20I – 51.75.<sup id="cite_ref-150" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-150"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>148<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b>Fastest to -</b> 3,000 runs (81 innings),<sup id="cite_ref-151" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-151"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>149<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 3,500 runs (96 innings),<sup id="cite_ref-:0_152-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-:0-152"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>150<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-153" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-153"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>151<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and 4,000 runs (107 innings)</li>
<li>Most Player of the Match awards (15 times)<sup id="cite_ref-154" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-154"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>152<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and Player of the Series awards (7 times)<sup id="cite_ref-:0_152-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-:0-152"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>150<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-155" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-155"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>153<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading4"><h4 id="IPL_records">IPL records</h4></div>
<ul><li>Most runs in <a href="/wiki/Indian_Premier_League" title="Indian Premier League">Indian Premier League</a> (8,004)<sup id="cite_ref-156" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-156"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>154<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>Most runs in a single edition of IPL (973 runs in <a href="/wiki/2016_Indian_Premier_League" title="2016 Indian Premier League">2016</a>).<sup id="cite_ref-Sen-2016_157-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Sen-2016-157"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>155<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>Only player to be involved in three double-century plus stands, two times with <a href="/wiki/AB_de_Villiers" title="AB de Villiers">AB de Villiers</a> and once with <a href="/wiki/Chris_Gayle" title="Chris Gayle">Chris Gayle</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-158" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-158"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>156<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>Most runs against <a href="/wiki/Delhi_Capitals" title="Delhi Capitals">Delhi Capitals</a> (1,030).<sup id="cite_ref-159" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-159"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>157<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>Most hundreds in the league (8)<sup id="cite_ref-160" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-160"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>158<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and in a single season (4)<sup id="cite_ref-Sen-2016_157-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Sen-2016-157"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>155<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Honours">Honours</h2></div>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading3"><h3 id="National_honours">National honours</h3></div>
<ul><li>2013 – <a href="/wiki/Arjuna_Award" title="Arjuna Award">Arjuna Award</a>, second highest sporting honour.<sup id="cite_ref-161" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-161"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>159<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>2017 –  <span typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/File:Padma_Shri_Ribbon.svg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/33/Padma_Shri_Ribbon.svg/50px-Padma_Shri_Ribbon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="50" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/33/Padma_Shri_Ribbon.svg/75px-Padma_Shri_Ribbon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/33/Padma_Shri_Ribbon.svg/100px-Padma_Shri_Ribbon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="218" data-file-height="60"></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Padma_Shri" title="Padma Shri">Padma Shri</a>, India's fourth highest civilian award.<sup id="cite_ref-PS1_162-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS1-162"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>160<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>2018 – <a href="/wiki/Major_Dhyan_Chand_Khel_Ratna_Award" class="mw-redirect" title="Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna Award">Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna Award</a>, India's highest sporting honour.<sup id="cite_ref-Indian_Express_2018-09-25_163-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Indian_Express_2018-09-25-163"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>161<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading3"><h3 id="Sporting_honours">Sporting honours</h3></div>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Awards_of_the_Decade" title="ICC Awards of the Decade">Sir Garfield Sobers Trophy</a> (ICC Men's Cricketer of the Decade): <a href="/wiki/ICC_Awards_of_the_Decade" title="ICC Awards of the Decade">2011–2020</a><sup id="cite_ref-164" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-164"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>162<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Sir_Garfield_Sobers_Trophy" title="Sir Garfield Sobers Trophy">Sir Garfield Sobers Trophy</a> (ICC Cricketer of the Year): <a href="/wiki/2017_ICC_Awards" title="2017 ICC Awards">2017</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-The_Indian_Express-2018_165-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Indian_Express-2018-165"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>163<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="/wiki/2018_ICC_Awards" title="2018 ICC Awards">2018</a><sup id="cite_ref-The_Hindu-2019_166-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Hindu-2019-166"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>164<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Awards_of_the_Decade" title="ICC Awards of the Decade">ICC Men's ODI Cricketer of the Decade</a>: 2011–2020<sup id="cite_ref-167" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-167"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>165<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_ODI_Player_of_the_Year" class="mw-redirect" title="ICC ODI Player of the Year">ICC ODI Player of the Year</a>: 2012,<sup id="cite_ref-168" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-168"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>166<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2017,<sup id="cite_ref-The_Indian_Express-2018_165-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Indian_Express-2018-165"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>163<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2018,<sup id="cite_ref-The_Hindu-2019_166-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Hindu-2019-166"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>164<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2023<sup id="cite_ref-OCOTY_169-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OCOTY-169"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>167<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Test_Player_of_the_Year" class="mw-redirect" title="ICC Test Player of the Year">ICC Test Player of the Year</a>: 2018<sup id="cite_ref-The_Hindu-2019_166-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Hindu-2019-166"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>164<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_ODI_Team_of_the_Year" class="mw-redirect" title="ICC ODI Team of the Year">ICC ODI Team of the Year</a>: 2012,<sup id="cite_ref-170" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-170"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>168<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2014, 2016 (captain),<sup id="cite_ref-171" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-171"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>169<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2017 (captain),<sup id="cite_ref-The_Indian_Express-2018_165-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Indian_Express-2018-165"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>163<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2018 (captain),<sup id="cite_ref-The_Hindu-2019_166-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Hindu-2019-166"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>164<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2019 (captain),<sup id="cite_ref-The_Hindu-2020_172-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Hindu-2020-172"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>170<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2023<sup id="cite_ref-173" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-173"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>171<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Test_Team_of_the_Year" class="mw-redirect" title="ICC Test Team of the Year">ICC Test Team of the Year</a>: 2017 (captain),<sup id="cite_ref-The_Indian_Express-2018_165-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Indian_Express-2018-165"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>163<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2018 (captain),<sup id="cite_ref-The_Hindu-2019_166-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Hindu-2019-166"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>164<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2019 (captain)<sup id="cite_ref-The_Hindu-2020_172-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Hindu-2020-172"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>170<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Men%27s_T20I_Team_of_the_Year" title="ICC Men's T20I Team of the Year">ICC Men's T20I Team of the Year</a>: 2022<sup id="cite_ref-174" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-174"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>172<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Awards" title="ICC Awards">ICC Spirit of Cricket</a>: 2019<sup id="cite_ref-175" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-175"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>173<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Awards_of_the_Decade" title="ICC Awards of the Decade">ICC Men's Test Team of the Decade</a>: 2011–2020 (captain)<sup id="cite_ref-176" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-176"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>174<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Awards_of_the_Decade" title="ICC Awards of the Decade">ICC Men's ODI Team of the Decade</a>: 2011–2020<sup id="cite_ref-The_Times_of_India-2020_177-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Times_of_India-2020-177"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>175<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Awards_of_the_Decade" title="ICC Awards of the Decade">ICC Men's T20I Team of the Decade</a>: 2011–2020<sup id="cite_ref-The_Times_of_India-2020_177-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Times_of_India-2020-177"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>175<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Polly_Umrigar_Award" title="Polly Umrigar Award">Polly Umrigar Award</a> for International Cricketer of the Year: 2011–12, 2014–15, 2015–16, 2016–17, 2017–18<sup id="cite_ref-178" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-178"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>176<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Wisden_Leading_Cricketer_in_the_World" title="Wisden Leading Cricketer in the World">Wisden Leading Cricketer in the World</a>: 2016, 2017, 2018<sup id="cite_ref-179" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-179"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>177<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ICC_Awards" title="ICC Awards">ICC Men's Player of the Month</a>: October 2022<sup id="cite_ref-180" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-180"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>178<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/CEAT_International_Cricketer_of_the_Year" class="mw-redirect" title="CEAT International Cricketer of the Year">CEAT International Cricketer of the Year</a>: 2011–12, 2013–14,<sup id="cite_ref-181" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-181"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>179<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2017– 18, 2018–19<sup id="cite_ref-182" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-182"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>180<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Indian_Premier_League" title="Indian Premier League">Indian Premier League</a> <a href="/wiki/List_of_Indian_Premier_League_awards#Orange_Cap" title="List of Indian Premier League awards">Orange Cap</a> for most runs: 2016,<sup id="cite_ref-183" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-183"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>181<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2024<sup id="cite_ref-184" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-184"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>182<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Barmy_Army" title="Barmy Army">Barmy Army</a> – International Player of Year: 2017, 2018<sup id="cite_ref-185" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-185"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>183<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/ESPNcricinfo" title="ESPNcricinfo">ESPNcricinfo</a> – ODI Batting Performance of the Year: 2012<sup id="cite_ref-186" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-186"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>184<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>

<li><a href="/wiki/Delhi_%26_District_Cricket_Association" title="Delhi &amp; District Cricket Association">Delhi &amp; District Cricket Association</a> (DDCA) renamed a stand after Kohli at <a href="/wiki/Feroz_Shah_Kotla_Ground" class="mw-redirect" title="Feroz Shah Kotla Ground">Feroz Shah Kotla</a>, <a href="/wiki/Delhi" title="Delhi">Delhi</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-The_Indian_Express-2019_87-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-The_Indian_Express-2019-87"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>86<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>

<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Notes">Notes</h2></div>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1239543626">.mw-parser-output .reflist{margin-bottom:0.5em;list-style-type:decimal}@media screen{.mw-parser-output .reflist{font-size:90%}}.mw-parser-output .reflist .references{font-size:100%;margin-bottom:0;list-style-type:inherit}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns-2{column-width:30em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns-3{column-width:25em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns{margin-top:0.3em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns ol{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns li{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}.mw-parser-output .reflist-upper-alpha{list-style-type:upper-alpha}.mw-parser-output .reflist-upper-roman{list-style-type:upper-roman}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-alpha{list-style-type:lower-alpha}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-greek{list-style-type:lower-greek}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-roman{list-style-type:lower-roman}</style><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">During a certain phase in his career, Kohli acquired the moniker <i>Cheeku/Chikoo</i>. One evening, Kohli availed himself of the services of a nearby salon and underwent a makeover. Upon displaying his new appearance to his colleagues, Kohli's assistant coach, Ajit Chowdhary, made a humorous comparison between Kohli's appearance and that of "Chikoo," a character from the popular Indian comic book, <i>Champak</i>.<sup id="cite_ref-FOOTNOTELokapally201629_1-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-FOOTNOTELokapally201629-1"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-144"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-144" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">He is also the second fastest to 5000, 6000, and 7000 runs after <a href="/wiki/Hashim_Amla" title="Hashim Amla">Hashim Amla</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-52"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-52" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://stats.espncricinfo.com/ci/engine/stats/index.html?class=2;filter=advanced;innings_number=2;orderby=hundreds;size=100;template=results;type=batting">"Statistics / Statsguru / One-Day Internationals / Batting records"</a>. <li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSrinivasa2019" class="citation book cs1">Srinivasa, Chakrapani (2019). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://blackwells.co.uk/bookshop/product/Kohlinoor-of-India-by-Chakrapani-Srinivasa-author/9781071215418"><i>Kohlinoor of India: Winner Virat Kohli</i></a>. Independently Published (published 1 June 2019). p.&nbsp;80. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-07-121541-8" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-07-121541-8"><bdi>978-1-07-121541-8</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Kohlinoor+of+India%3A+Winner+Virat+Kohli&amp;rft.pages=80&amp;rft.pub=Independently+Published&amp;rft.date=2019&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-07-121541-8&amp;rft.aulast=Srinivasa&amp;rft.aufirst=Chakrapani&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fblackwells.co.uk%2Fbookshop%2Fproduct%2FKohlinoor-of-India-by-Chakrapani-Srinivasa-author%2F9781071215418&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AVirat+Kohli" class="Z3988"></span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFKumarPandeyShambunath2021" class="citation book cs1">Kumar, Vivek; Pandey; Shambunath (2021). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://bookshop.org/p/books/virat-kohli-colour-indian-cricketer-vivek-kumar-pandey-shambhunath/18071179"><i>Virat Kohli Colour: Indian Cricketer</i></a>. <a href="/wiki/Notion_Press" title="Notion Press">Notion Press</a> (published 18 December 2021). p.&nbsp;54. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/979-88-85460-14-9" title="Special:BookSources/979-88-85460-14-9"><bdi>979-88-85460-14-9</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Virat+Kohli+Colour%3A+Indian+Cricketer&amp;rft.pages=54&amp;rft.pub=Notion+Press&amp;rft.date=2021&amp;rft.isbn=979-88-85460-14-9&amp;rft.aulast=Kumar&amp;rft.aufirst=Vivek&amp;rft.au=Pandey&amp;rft.au=Shambunath&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbookshop.org%2Fp%2Fbooks%2Fvirat-kohli-colour-indian-cricketer-vivek-kumar-pandey-shambhunath%2F18071179&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AVirat+Kohli" class="Z3988"></span></li></ul>

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="India_Captains" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:#0077FF;color:#F4F6F7;border: 1px solid #154360;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><div id="India_Captains" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">India Captains</div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0;font-size:114%"><div style="padding:0px">
<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="India_Test_cricket_captains" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: white; color: #0077FF;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:India_Test_cricket_captains" title="Template:India Test cricket captains"><abbr title="View this template" style="color: #0077FF">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:India_Test_cricket_captains" title="Template talk:India Test cricket captains"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="color: #0077FF">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:India_Test_cricket_captains" title="Special:EditPage/Template:India Test cricket captains"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="color: #0077FF">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="India_Test_cricket_captains" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/List_of_India_national_cricket_captains" title="List of India national cricket captains"><span style="color:#0077FF;">India Test cricket captains</span></a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>1932–1933/34: <a href="/wiki/C._K._Nayudu" title="C. K. Nayudu">Nayudu</a></li>
<li>1936: <a href="/wiki/Maharajkumar_of_Vizianagram" title="Maharajkumar of Vizianagram">Vizianagaram</a></li>
<li>1946: <a href="/wiki/Iftikhar_Ali_Khan_Pataudi" title="Iftikhar Ali Khan Pataudi">Pataudi, Sr.</a></li>
<li>1947/48–1952/53: <a href="/wiki/Lala_Amarnath" title="Lala Amarnath">Amarnath</a></li>
<li>1951/52–1952/53: <a href="/wiki/Vijay_Hazare" title="Vijay Hazare">Hazare</a></li>
<li>1954/55; <i>1958/59</i>: <a href="/wiki/Vinoo_Mankad" title="Vinoo Mankad">Mankad</a></li>
<li><i>1955/56</i>; 1958/59: <a href="/wiki/Ghulam_Ahmed_(cricketer)" title="Ghulam Ahmed (cricketer)">Ahmed</a></li>
<li>1955/56–1956/57; <i>1958/59</i>: <a href="/wiki/Polly_Umrigar" title="Polly Umrigar">Umrigar</a></li>
<li><i>1958/59: <a href="/wiki/Hemu_Adhikari" title="Hemu Adhikari">Adhikari</a></i></li>
<li>1959: <a href="/wiki/Datta_Gaekwad" title="Datta Gaekwad">Gaekwad</a></li>
<li><i>1959: <a href="/wiki/Pankaj_Roy" title="Pankaj Roy">Roy</a></i></li>
<li>1959/60: <a href="/wiki/Gulabrai_Ramchand" title="Gulabrai Ramchand">Ramchand</a></li>
<li>1960/61–1961/62; <i>1961/62</i>: <a href="/wiki/Nari_Contractor" title="Nari Contractor">Contractor</a></li>
<li>1961/62–1974/75: <a href="/wiki/Mansoor_Ali_Khan_Pataudi" title="Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi">Pataudi, Jr.</a></li>
<li><i>1967/68: <a href="/wiki/Chandu_Borde" title="Chandu Borde">Borde</a></i></li>
<li>1970/71–1974: <a href="/wiki/Ajit_Wadekar" title="Ajit Wadekar">Wadekar</a></li>
<li><i>1974/75</i>; 1979: <a href="/wiki/Srinivasaraghavan_Venkataraghavan" title="Srinivasaraghavan Venkataraghavan">Venkataraghavan</a></li>
<li><i>1975/76</i>; 1978/79–1984/85: <a href="/wiki/Sunil_Gavaskar" title="Sunil Gavaskar">Gavaskar</a></li>
<li>1975/75–1978/79: <a href="/wiki/Bishan_Singh_Bedi" title="Bishan Singh Bedi">Bedi</a></li>
<li><i>1979/80</i>; 1979/80: <a href="/wiki/Gundappa_Viswanath" title="Gundappa Viswanath">Viswanath</a></li>
<li>1982/83–1986/87: <a href="/wiki/Kapil_Dev" title="Kapil Dev">Dev</a></li>
<li>1987/88–1988/89: <a href="/wiki/Dilip_Vengsarkar" title="Dilip Vengsarkar">Vengsarkar</a></li>
<li><i>1987/88: <a href="/wiki/Ravi_Shastri" title="Ravi Shastri">Shastri</a></i></li>
<li>1989/90: <a href="/wiki/Krishnamachari_Srikkanth" title="Krishnamachari Srikkanth">Srikkanth</a></li>
<li>1989/90–1998/99: <a href="/wiki/Mohammad_Azharuddin" title="Mohammad Azharuddin">Azhar</a></li>
<li>1996/97–1999/00: <a href="/wiki/Sachin_Tendulkar" title="Sachin Tendulkar">Tendulkar</a></li>
<li>2000/01–2005/06: <a href="/wiki/Sourav_Ganguly" title="Sourav Ganguly">Ganguly</a></li>
<li><i>2003/04; 2004/05</i>; 2005/06–2007: <a href="/wiki/Rahul_Dravid" title="Rahul Dravid">Dravid</a></li>
<li><i>2005/06; 2009; 2010; 2012: <a href="/wiki/Virender_Sehwag" title="Virender Sehwag">Sehwag</a></i></li>
<li>2007–2008: <a href="/wiki/Anil_Kumble" title="Anil Kumble">Kumble</a></li>
<li>2008–2014: <a href="/wiki/MS_Dhoni" title="MS Dhoni">Dhoni</a></li>
<li><i>2014/15</i>; 2015–2022: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Kohli</a></li>
<li><i>2016/17; 2020/21; 2021/22: <a href="/wiki/Ajinkya_Rahane" title="Ajinkya Rahane">Rahane</a></i></li>
<li><i>2021/22: <a href="/wiki/KL_Rahul" title="KL Rahul">Rahul</a></i></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"><small><i>Italics</i> denote deputised captaincy</small></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="India_ODI_cricket_captains" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: #0077FF; <div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="India_squads" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:#0077FF;color:#F4F6F7;border: 1px solid #3498DB;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><div id="India_squads" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">India squads</div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0;font-size:114%"><div style="padding:0px">
<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="India_squad_–_2010_Asia_Cup_–_Champions_(5th_title)" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks vcard mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="3" style="background-color:#0D3AA9;color:#FF8800;border:1px solid #FF8800"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:India_Squad_2010_Asia_Cup" title="Template:India Squad 2010 Asia Cup"><abbr title="View this template" href="/wiki/India_cricket_team" class="mw-redirect" title="India cricket team"><span style="color:#FF8800">India squad</span></a> – <a href="/wiki/2010_Asia_Cup#Squads" title="2010 Asia Cup"><span style="color:#FF8800">2010 Asia Cup – Champions (5th title)</span></a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="agent vcard"><small>1</small>&nbsp;<span class="fn"><a href="/wiki/MS_Dhoni" title="MS Dhoni">Dhoni</a> (<a href="/wiki/Captain_(cricket)" title="Captain (cricket)">c</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Wicket-keeper" title="Wicket-keeper">wk</a>)</span></span></li>

<li><span class="agent vcard"><small>11</small>&nbsp;<span class="fn"><a href="/wiki/Pragyan_Ojha" title="Pragyan Ojha">Ojha</a></span></span></li>

<li><span class="agent vcard"><small>55</small>&nbsp;<span class="fn"><a href="/wiki/Anuj_Rawat" title="Anuj Rawat">Rawat</a> (<a href="/wiki/Wicket_keeper" class="mw-redirect" title="Wicket keeper">†</a>)</span></span></li>
<li><span class="agent vcard"><small>69</small>&nbsp;<span class="fn"><a href="/wiki/Lockie_Ferguson" title="Lockie Ferguson">Ferguson</a></span></span></li>

<li><span class="agent vcard"><small>97</small>&nbsp;<span class="fn"><a href="/wiki/Rajat_Patidar" title="Rajat Patidar">Patidar</a></span></span></li>

<ul><li><span class="nowrap">Head Coach: <a href="/wiki/Andy_Flower" title="Andy Flower">Andy Flower</a></span></li>

</div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Awards_and_achievements" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold;color:black;border: 1px solid #F7DC6F;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><div id="Awards_and_achievements" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">Awards and achievements</div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0;font-size:114%"><div style="padding:0px">

inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div </div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="ICC_Men&amp;#039;s_Cricketer_of_the_Year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:ICC_Men%27s_Cricketer_of_the_Year" title="Template:ICC Men's Cricketer of the Year"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:ICC_Men%27s_Cricketer_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:ICC Men's Cricketer of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:ICC_Men%27s_Cricketer_of_the_Year" title="Special:EditPage/Template:ICC Men's Cricketer of the Year"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="ICC_Men&amp;#039;s_Cricketer_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Sir_Garfield_Sobers_Trophy" title="Sir Garfield Sobers Trophy">ICC Men's Cricketer of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">2004: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Rahul_Dravid" title="Rahul Dravid">Dravid</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa_national_cricket_team" title="South Africa national cricket team"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Jacques_Kallis" title="Jacques Kallis">Kallis</a>/<span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/England_cricket_team" title="England cricket team"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/35px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/46px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Andrew_Flintoff" title="Andrew Flintoff">Flintoff</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Ricky_Ponting" title="Ricky Ponting">Ponting</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Ricky_Ponting" title="Ricky Ponting">Ponting</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/West_Indies_cricket_team" title="West Indies cricket team"><img alt="Cricket West Indies" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/23px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/35px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/46px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="486" data-file-height="309"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Shivnarine_Chanderpaul" title="Shivnarine Chanderpaul">Chanderpaul</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Mitchell_Johnson" title="Mitchell Johnson">Johnson</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Michael_Clarke_(cricketer)" title="Michael Clarke (cricketer)">Clarke</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Kohli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Kohli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/England_cricket_team" title="England cricket team"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/35px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/46px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Ben_Stokes" title="Ben Stokes">Stokes</a></span></li>

<ul><li><span class="nowrap">2004: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Rahul_Dravid" title="Rahul Dravid">Dravid</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa_national_cricket_team" title="South Africa national cricket team"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Jacques_Kallis" title="Jacques Kallis">Kallis</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Ricky_Ponting" title="Ricky Ponting">Ponting</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Pakistan_national_cricket_team" title="Pakistan national cricket team"><img alt="Pakistan" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/23px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/35px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/45px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Mohammad_Yousuf_(cricketer)" title="Mohammad Yousuf (cricketer)">Yousuf</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa_national_cricket_team" title="South Africa national cricket team"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Dale_Steyn" title="Dale Steyn">Steyn</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Gautam_Gambhir" title="Gautam Gambhir">Gambhir</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Virender_Sehwag" title="Virender Sehwag">Sehwag</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/England_cricket_team" title="England cricket team"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/35px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/46px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Alastair_Cook" title="Alastair Cook">Cook</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Sri_Lanka_national_cricket_team" title="Sri Lanka national cricket team"><img alt="Sri Lanka" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/23px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/35px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/46px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Kumar_Sangakkara" title="Kumar Sangakkara">Sangakkara</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Michael_Clarke_(cricketer)" title="Michael Clarke (cricketer)">Clarke</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Mitchell_Johnson" title="Mitchell Johnson">Johnson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Steve_Smith_(cricketer)" title="Steve Smith (cricketer)">Smith</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Ravichandran_Ashwin" title="Ravichandran Ashwin">Ashwin</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Steve_Smith_(cricketer)" title="Steve Smith (cricketer)">Smith</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Kohli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Pat_Cummins" title="Pat Cummins">Cummins</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2022: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/England_cricket_team" title="England cricket team"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/35px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/46px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Ben_Stokes" title="Ben Stokes">Stokes</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2023: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Usman_Khawaja" title="Usman Khawaja">Khawaja</a></span></li></ul>

<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Michael_Hussey" title="Michael Hussey">Hussey</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/MS_Dhoni" title="MS Dhoni">Dhoni</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa_national_cricket_team" title="South Africa national cricket team"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/AB_de_Villiers" title="AB de Villiers">de Villiers</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Sri_Lanka_national_cricket_team" title="Sri Lanka national cricket team"><img alt="Sri Lanka" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/23px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/35px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/46px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Kumar_Sangakkara" title="Kumar Sangakkara">Sangakkara</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Kohli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Sri_Lanka_national_cricket_team" title="Sri Lanka national cricket team"><img alt="Sri Lanka" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/23px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/35px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/46px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Kumar_Sangakkara" title="Kumar Sangakkara">Sangakkara</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa_national_cricket_team" title="South Africa national cricket team"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/AB_de_Villiers" title="AB de Villiers">de Villiers</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa_national_cricket_team" title="South Africa national cricket team"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/AB_de_Villiers" title="AB de Villiers">de Villiers</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa_national_cricket_team" title="South Africa national cricket team"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Quinton_de_Kock" title="Quinton de Kock">de Kock</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Kohli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Kohli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Rohit_Sharma" title="Rohit Sharma">Rohit</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2021: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Pakistan_national_cricket_team" title="Pakistan national cricket team"><img alt="Pakistan" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/23px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/35px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/45px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Babar_Azam" title="Babar Azam">Babar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2022: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Pakistan_national_cricket_team" title="Pakistan national cricket team"><img alt="Pakistan" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/23px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/35px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/45px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Babar_Azam" title="Babar Azam">Babar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2023: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Kohli</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
