<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="2013_ICC_Champions_Trophy_Team_of_the_Tournament" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:2013_CT_TOTT" title="Template:2013 CT TOTT"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:2013_CT_TOTT&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:2013 CT TOTT (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:2013_CT_TOTT" title="Special:EditPage/Template:2013 CT TOTT"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="2013_ICC_Champions_Trophy_Team_of_the_Tournament" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/2013_ICC_Champions_Trophy" title="2013 ICC Champions Trophy">2013 ICC Champions Trophy</a> Team of the Tournament</div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><b><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India" title="India"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Shikhar_Dhawan" title="Shikhar Dhawan">Shikhar Dhawan</a></b></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/35px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/46px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Jonathan_Trott" title="Jonathan Trott">Jonathan Trott</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Sri_Lanka" title="Sri Lanka"><img alt="Sri Lanka" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/23px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/35px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg/46px-Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Kumar_Sangakkara" title="Kumar Sangakkara">Kumar Sangakkara</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India" title="India"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Virat Kohli</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Pakistan" title="Pakistan"><img alt="Pakistan" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/23px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/35px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/45px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Misbah-ul-Haq" title="Misbah-ul-Haq">Misbah-ul-Haq</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India" title="India"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/MS_Dhoni" title="MS Dhoni">MS Dhoni</a> <i>(<a href="/wiki/Captain_(cricket)" title="Captain (cricket)">c</a> &amp; wk)</i></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India" title="India"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Ravindra_Jadeja" title="Ravindra Jadeja">Ravindra Jadeja</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa" title="South Africa"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Ryan_McLaren" title="Ryan McLaren">Ryan McLaren</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India" title="India"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Bhuvneshwar_Kumar" title="Bhuvneshwar Kumar">Bhuvneshwar Kumar</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/35px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/46px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/James_Anderson_(cricketer)" title="James Anderson (cricketer)">James Anderson</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/New_Zealand" title="New Zealand"><img alt="New Zealand" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3e/Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg/23px-Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3e/Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg/35px-Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3e/Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg/46px-Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Mitchell_McClenaghan" title="Mitchell McClenaghan">Mitchell McClenaghan</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/35px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/46px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Joe_Root" title="Joe Root">Joe Root</a> <i>(<a href="/wiki/Twelfth_man_(cricket)" class="mw-redirect" title="Twelfth man (cricket)">12th man</a>)</i></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td class="navbox-abovebelow hlist" colspan="2"><div><small>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Geoff_Allardice" title="Geoff Allardice">Geoff Allardice</a>, <a href="/wiki/Javagal_Srinath" title="Javagal Srinath">Javagal Srinath</a>, <a href="/wiki/Aleem_Dar" title="Aleem Dar">Aleem Dar</a>, <a href="/wiki/Scyld_Berry" title="Scyld Berry">Scyld Berry</a> and Stephen Brenkley were the Panel of selectors for the Team.</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Shikhar_Dhawan" title="Shikhar Dhawan">Shikhar Dhawan</a> was adjudged as the <b>Player of the Tournament</b>.</li></ul>
</small></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:IPL_Player_of_the_Series" title="Template:IPL Player of the Series"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:IPL_Player_of_the_Series" title="Template talk:IPL Player of the Series"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:IPL_Player_of_the_Series" title="Special:EditPage/Template:IPL Player of the Series"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Indian_Premier_League_Most_Valuable_Player" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Indian_Premier_League" title="Indian Premier League">Indian Premier League</a> <a href="/wiki/List_of_Indian_Premier_League_awards" title="List of Indian Premier League awards">Most Valuable Player</a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2008_Indian_Premier_League" title="2008 Indian Premier League">2008</a>: </b><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Shane_Watson" title="Shane Watson">Watson</a> (<a href="/wiki/Rajasthan_Royals" title="Rajasthan Royals">RR</a>)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2009_Indian_Premier_League" title="2009 Indian Premier League">2009</a>: </b><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Adam_Gilchrist" title="Adam Gilchrist">Gilchrist</a> (<a href="/wiki/Deccan_Chargers" title="Deccan Chargers">DEC</a>)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2010_Indian_Premier_League" title="2010 Indian Premier League">2010</a>: </b><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/India_national_cricket_team" title="India national cricket team"><img alt="India" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Sachin_Tendulkar" title="Sachin Tendulkar">Tendulkar</a> (<a href="/wiki/Mumbai_Indians" title="Mumbai Indians">MI</a>)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2011_Indian_Premier_League" title="2011 Indian Premier League">2011</a>: </b><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/West_Indies_cricket_team" title="West Indies cricket team"><img alt="Cricket West Indies" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/23px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/35px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/46px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="486" data-file-height="309"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Chris_Gayle" title="Chris Gayle">Gayle</a> (<a href="/wiki/Royal_Challengers_Bangalore" title="Royal Challengers Bangalore">RCB</a>)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2012_Indian_Premier_League" title="2012 Indian Premier League">2012</a>: </b><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/West_Indies_cricket_team" title="West Indies cricket team"><img alt="Cricket West Indies" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/23px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/35px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/18/WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg/46px-WestIndiesCricketFlagPre1999.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="486" data-file-height="309"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Sunil_Narine" title="Sunil Narine">Narine</a> (<a href="/wiki/Kolkata_Knight_Riders" title="Kolkata Knight Riders">KKR</a>)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2013_Indian_Premier_League" title="2013 Indian Premier League">2013</a>: </b><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Australia_national_cricket_team" title="Australia national cricket team"><img alt="Australia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/88/Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Australia_%28converted%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="640"></a></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Shane_Watson" title="Shane Watson">Watson</a> (<a href="/wiki/Rajasthan_Royals" title="Rajasthan Royals">RR</a>)</span></li>

<li><b><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Virat Kohli</a></b> <small>(113)</small></li>
